Class Threads

java.lang.Object
arc.util.Threads
public class Threads extends Object
Utilities for threaded programming.

    • unboundedExecutor

      public static ExecutorService unboundedExecutor(@Nullable String name, int min)
      Parameters:
      min - the number of threads to keep alive at all times after they are first started
      Returns:
      an executor with no max thread count. threads expire after 1 minute of inactivity

    • boundedExecutor

      public static ExecutorService boundedExecutor(@Nullable String name, int max)
      Parameters:
      max - maximum number of threads to create
      Returns:
      an executor with a max thread count. threads expire after 1 minute of inactivity
